title: Four More Years and More
author: VD
content_html:
We’ve created two new channels on UATV for subscribers. Both are music channels and feature both listenable and downloadable MP3s as well as viewable videos. One is dedicated to Booster Patrol, the other, called Voxiphonik, is comprised of my various AI music experiments in a variety of genres, including A Drink with a Coconut, Seas of Blood, and Four More Years (Bright Future mix). Which, of course, should not be confused with Booster Patrol’s Four More Years (Storm mix). There are only a few songs up there now, but more will be uploaded over the next month.

FOUR MORE YEARS (Storm mix)

I woke up in the morning
In the real America
The sun was shining brightly
The new era had dawned

It felt as if the last four years
Were nothing but a dream
From nightmare to insanity
And nothing in between

Hey hey hey na na nay
The man is back in town
Hey hey hey na na nay
The second time around

Four more four more four more years
Four more four more four more years
This time he’ll do it right
Four more four more four more years
Four more four more four more years
The future’s looking bright

You knew that he was coming back
The man you couldn’t stump
You knew you couldn’t stop him
The man named Donald Trump

You stole four very precious years
And spent them all on war
So now we’re drinking up your tears
We’re coming back for more

Hey hey hey na na nay
The man is back in town
Hey hey hey na na nay
The storm is coming round

Four more four more four more years
Four more four more four more years
This time he’ll do it right, this time he’ll do it right!
Four more four more four more years
Four more four more four more years
The future looks so bright you’re gonna need shades!
Four more four more four more years
Four more four more four more years
This time he’ll do it right, yeah yeah
Four more four more four more years
Four more four more four more years
The future’s looking bright, Hell yeah!

Hey hey hey na na nay
The man is back in town
Hey hey hey na na nay
The second time around
Hey hey hey na na nay
The clowns are going down
Hey hey hey na na nay
The storm is coming round
I said the storm is coming round, yeah!

DISCUSS ON SG
